name: ant
description:
Ant is a platform-independent build tool for java. It's used by apache
jakarta and xml projects.

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <g.rousse@linux-mandrake.com> 1.2-1mdk
changes.text:
- first Mandrake release
- used SRPMS from Henri Gomez <hgomez@users.sourceforge.net>

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <g.rousse@linux-mandrake.com> 1.2-2mdk
changes.text:
- new spec file
- discarded ugly non-free Sun jaxp library from sources, and used pretty open-source xerces instead

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <g.rousse@linux-mandrake.com> 1.2-3mdk
changes.text:
- changed name to jakarta-ant
- changed group to Development/Java

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <g.rousse@linux-mandrake.com> 1.2-4mdk
changes.text:
- merged with Henri Gomez <hgomez@users.sourceforge.net> specs:
- changed name to ant
- changed javadir to /usr/share/java
- dropped jdk and jre requirement
- corrected require to jaxp
- added Jikes support
- used our own bash script
- dropped perl script
- dropped ant home directory

changes.author: Christian Zoffoli <czoffoli@linux-mandrake.com> 1.2-5mdk
changes.text:
- more macros
- added italian in spec

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <g.rousse@linux-mandrake.com> 1.2-6mdk
changes.text: - corrected launch script

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <g.rousse@linux-mandrake.com> 1.2-7mdk
changes.text:
- launch script improvments (Christian Zoffoli <czoffoli@linux-mandrake.com>)
- added french in spec
- more macros

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <g.rousse@linux-mandrake.com> 1.2-8mdk
changes.text:
- spec cleanup
- corrected changelog
- changed description

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <guillomovitch@users.sourceforge.net> 1.2-9mdk
changes.text:
- vendor tag
- packager tag

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <guillomovitch@users.sourceforge.net> 1.3-1mdk
changes.text:
- 1.3
- new versioning scheme
- compiled with oro, junit and stylebook support
- spec cleanup

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <guillomovitch@users.sourceforge.net> 1.3-2mdk
changes.text:
- s/Copyright/License/
- truncated description to 72 columns in spec
- updated launch script

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <guillomovitch@users.sourceforge.net> 1.3-3mdk
changes.text:
- used alternative jaxp_parser
- updated launch script

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <guillomovitch@users.sourceforge.net> 1.3-4mdk
changes.text: - jaxp_parser symlink is now jaxp_parser.jar

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <guillomovitch@users.sourceforge.net> 1.4-1mdk
changes.text:
- 1.4
- added xalan-j2 antlr bsf rhino to buildrequires and requires
- launch script cleanup

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <guillomovitch@users.sourceforge.net> 1.4-2jpp
changes.text:
- first unified release
- dropped explicit xalan-j2 requirement, as stylebook-1.0b3 already requires it
- added missing xalan-j1 compatibility classes
- s/jPackage/JPackage

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <guillomovitch@users.sourceforge.net> 1.4-3jpp
changes.text: - more macros

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <guillomovitch@users.sourceforge.net> 1.4-4jpp
changes.text: - used original tarball

changes.author: Christian Zoffoli <czoffoli@littlepenguin.org> 1.4.1-2jpp
changes.text:
- conditional build
- removed packager tag
- new jpp extension
- added xalan 2.2.D13 support
- added BuildRequires: xalan-j2 >= 2.2.D13
- removed Requires: oro junit stylebook-1.0b3 bsf rhino antlr

changes.author: Christian Zoffoli <czoffoli@littlepenguin.org> 1.4.1-3jpp
changes.text:
- readded Requires: oro junit stylebook-1.0b3 bsf rhino antlr to the main package
- corrected changelog release 1jpp-> 2jpp

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <guillomovitch@users.sourceforge.net> 1.4.1-4jpp
changes.text:
- removed conditional build
- removed redundant BuildRequires
- ant-optional.jar in ant-optional package
- javadoc into javadoc package
- new launch script using functions library

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <guillomovitch@users.sourceforge.net> 1.4.1-5jpp
changes.text:
- versioned dir for javadoc
- no dependencies for manual and javadoc packages
- stricter dependency for optional package
- additional sources in individual archives
- upgraded launch script
- no more javadoc cross-linking
- additional requirement for optional package: xml-commons-apis, xalan-j2, xalan-j2-compat, jaf, javamail, & log4j

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <guillomovitch@users.sourceforge.net> 1.4.1-6jpp
changes.text:
- cleaned manifest from class-path references
- section macro

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <guillomovitch@users.sourceforge.net> 1.4.1-7jpp
changes.text:
- adaptation to new stylebook1.0b3 package
- stylebook is a dependency of optional package
- removed redundant dependencies
- launch script correction

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <guillomovitch@users.sourceforge.net> 1.4.1-8jpp
changes.text: - netcomponents support

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <guillomovitch@users.sourceforge.net> 1.4.1-9jpp
changes.text: - jaxp_parser2 support

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <guillomovitch@users.sourceforge.net> 1.4.1-10jpp
changes.text: - used xalan-j1 instead of xalan-j2-compat

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <guillomovitch@users.sourceforge.net> 1.4.1-11jpp
changes.text:
- no more jikes specific support in launch script
- source user prefs before configuration in launch script
- distribution tag
- group tag
- provided original script as documentation

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <guillomovitch@users.sourceforge.net> 1.4.1-12jpp
changes.text:
- hardcoded distribution and vendor tag
- group tag again

changes.author: Henri Gomez <hgomez@users.sourceforge.net> 1.5.Beta3-1jpp
changes.text:
- ant 1.5 beta 3
- added bcel as required

changes.author: Henri Gomez <hgomez@users.sourceforge.net> 1.4.1-14jpp
changes.text: - added regexp to list of dependant packages

changes.author: Henri Gomez <hgomez@users.sourceforge.net> 1.4.1-13jpp
changes.text:
- added optional-full which include all ant tasks, even those without
  matching package
- added jdepend 2.2
- remove require oro, since ant could works without it
- ant lib is now in %{_javadir}/%{name}, put external jars here

changes.author: Ville Skyttä <ville.skytta at iki.fi> 1.5-2jpp
changes.text:
- Requires jaxp_parser_impl, no longer jaxp_parser2
  (jaxp_parser_impl already requires xml-commons-apis).
- Use sed instead of bash 2 extension when symlinking.

changes.author: Henri Gomez <hgomez@users.sourceforge.net> 1.5-1jpp
changes.text: * ant 1.5

changes.author: Henri Gomez <hgomez@users.sourceforge.net> 1.5-3jpp
changes.text: - add missing symlink between optional-full.jar and optional.jar

changes.author: Henri Gomez <hgomez@users.sourceforge.net> 1.5-5jpp
changes.text:
- ant script standard behaviour restored, ie ant/lib jars are taken
  before CLASSPATH. You should define CLASSPATH_OVERRIDE env var to have
  CLASSPATH before ant/lib jars
- applied ant script patch for cygwin (cygwin rpm users around ?)
- remove conflict in ant-optional-full, just put provides

changes.author: Henri Gomez <hgomez@users.sourceforge.net> 1.5-4jpp
changes.text:
- fix a problem in xerces-j2 build by changing the way CLASSPATH is constructed:
  first add jars found in CLASSPATH, then add xml-commons-apis, jaxp_parser_impl,
  ant, ant-optional and finish with jars found in ant/lib.
- jpackage-utils is no more required (but recommanded :)
- ant-optional-full provides ant-optional
- fix link between manual and api (javadoc)

changes.author: Henri Gomez <hgomez@users.sourceforge.net> 1.5.1-2jpp
changes.text: - really used JDK 1.4.1 to get JDK 1.4.x Regexp

changes.author: Henri Gomez <hgomez@users.sourceforge.net> 1.5.1-3jpp
changes.text:
- new post script for optional-full since rpm didn't works as
  expected and didn't set correct symlink for ant-optional.jar

changes.author: Ville Skyttä <ville.skytta at iki.fi> - 1.5.1-4jpp
changes.text:
- Patched to allow easier use with Jikes and IBM's 1.4.0, see
  <http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=15289> for details.

changes.author: Guillaume Rousse <guillomovitch@users.sourceforge.net> 1.5.1-5jpp
changes.text:
- scripts subpackages
- file-based manual dependencies, as packages doesn't have the same name on RedHat and Mandrake

changes.author: Ville Skyttä <ville.skytta at iki.fi> - 1.5.1-6jpp
changes.text: - Really get rid of automatic dependencies for the -scripts package.

changes.author: David Walluck <david@anti-microsoft.org> 1.5.1-7jpp
changes.text: - oldbsf

changes.author: Ville Skyttä <ville.skytta at iki.fi> - 1.5.1-8jpp
changes.text:
- Symlink a transformer into ANT_LIB for smoother experience on Java 1.3.
- Requires jaxp_transform_impl.
- Don't remove optional.jar symlinks on optional-full upgrade.
- Include Sun's 1.4 JSSE and JCE jars in runtime path, see
  <http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=16242>.
- Use jpackage-utils for setting JAVA_HOME when building.
- Built with Sun 1.4.1_01 javac.

changes.author: Henri Gomez <hgomez@users.sourceforge.net> 1.5.2-2jp
changes.text: - updated URL and source location

changes.author: Henri Gomez <hgomez@users.sourceforge.net> 1.5.2-1jp
changes.text:
- 1.5.2
- remove JDK 1.4 related patchs which are now included in ant 1.5.2
- fix ant-optional-full pre/post install script (now remove correctly all
  ant optional jars)
- Built with jikes 1.18 and IBM SDK 1.4

changes.author: Henri Gomez <hgomez@users.sourceforge.net> 1.5.2-3jp
changes.text:
- rebuilt with IBM SDK 1.3.1 since there was zip corruption when built
  with jikes 1.18 and IBM SDK 1.4.

changes.author: Henri Gomez <hgomez@users.sourceforge.net> 1.5.2-4jp
changes.text:
- changed provided /etc/ant.conf so that if usejikes is allready provided
  it didn't set it. Which such modification if you want to disable
  ant to use jikes even if jikes is set in /etc/ant.conf you'll just have
  to do usejikes=false ant build.xml.

changes.author: Ville Skyttä <ville.skytta at iki.fi> - 1.5.2-5jpp
changes.text:
- Move ANT_HOME to /usr/share/ant.
- Don't special-case the lib dir for RPM layout any more, use ANT_HOME/lib.
- Install XSLs into ANT_HOME/etc.
- Call set_jvm by default in ant.conf.
- Provide ant-optional-clean (versioned) in ant-optional.
- Make ant-optional-full conflict with ant-optional-clean.
- Add version info to ant-optional provision in ant-optional-full.
- Built with Sun 1.4.1_02 javac (to get JDK 1.4 regex).

changes.author: Nicolas Mailhot <Nicolas.Mailhot at JPackage.org> - 1.5.2-7jpp
changes.text: - for JPackage-utils 1.5

changes.author: Nicolas Mailhot <Nicolas.Mailhot at JPackage.org> - 1.5.2-10jpp
changes.text: - hopefully fix CLASSSPATH_OVERRIDE behaviour

changes.author: Nicolas Mailhot <Nicolas.Mailhot at JPackage.org> - 1.5.2-11jpp
changes.text: - add an optional jar list as per Ville's suggestion

changes.author: Nicolas Mailhot <Nicolas.Mailhot at JPackage.org> - 1.5.2-13jpp
changes.text:
- ant-optional is optional (silly me)
- jaxp_transform is optional , do not require it
- epoch, correct jpackage-utils requires...

changes.author: Ville Skyttä <ville.skytta at iki.fi> - 0:1.5.3-1jpp
changes.text:
- Update to 1.5.3.
- Remove runtime java-devel dependency.
- Add Epochs in all Provides and Requires.
- Include non-versioned javadoc symlink.
- Build without dependencies that are partially or completely missing from
  JPackage 1.5 (oldbsf, xalan-j1, stylebook1.0b3).
- Add netcomponents to optional jar list in ant.conf.

changes.author: Ville Skyttä <ville.skytta at iki.fi> - 0:1.5.3-2jpp
changes.text: - Fix non-versioned javadoc symlinking.

changes.author: Paul Nasrat <pauln at truemesh.com> - 0:1.5.4-1jpp
changes.text:
- Update to 1.5.4
- JavaCC task fixed using merged upstream patches from ant HEAD

changes.author: Paul Nasrat <pauln at truemesh.com> - 0:1.5.4-2jpp
changes.text: - remove bogus NoSource entries

changes.author: Randy Watler <rwatler at finali.com> - 0:1.6.0-1jpp
changes.text:
- Update to Ant 1.6.0
- Break out optional/optional-full components
- Revise ant launch scripts and support ~/.ant/ant.conf configuration file
- Use --noconfig flag to bootstrap ant build and override existing jpp config
- Modify ant launcher to use ant.library.dir property to find extra jars
- Port changes made in ant launch script for 1.6.2 back into patches

changes.author: Randy Watler <rwatler at finali.com> - 0:1.6.1-1jpp
changes.text:
- Update to Ant 1.6.1
- Change ant launch script to source instead of patch
- Move optional components to ant subdirectory: %{_javadir}/%{name}
- Remove os/2 scripts and set JAVA_HOME for build

changes.author: Randy Watler <rwatler at finali.com> - 0:1.6.1-1jpp
changes.text: - Extend subpackage builds to update ant.conf

changes.author: Fernando Nasser <fnasser at redhat.com> - 0:1.6.1-2jpp
changes.text:
- Remove incorrect noreplace option for ant.conf; it can't be used anymore
  because the sub-packages update that file.
- Add patch to fix temp directory used for file containing large
  command strings (> 4k)

changes.author: Fernando Nasser <fnasser at redhat.com> - 0:1.6.2-1jpp
changes.text: - Update to Ant 1.6.2

changes.author: Fernando Nasser <fnasser at redhat.com> - 0:1.6.2-2jpp
changes.text: - Fix to backward compatibility symbolic links.

changes.author: Gary Benson <gbenson at redhat.com> - 0:1.6.2-3jpp
changes.text: - Build OPT_JAR_LIST from files in /etc/ant.d.

changes.author: Fernando Nasser <fnasser at redhat.com> - 0:1.6.5-1jpp
changes.text:
- Upgrade to 1.6.5
- Incorporate the following changes:
  From Gary Benson <gbenson at redhat.com>:
- Allow subpackages not in Fedora to be installed from JPackage
- Add NOTICE file as per Apache License version 2.0
- Own /usr/share/java/ant
  From Vadim Nasardinov <vadimn@redhat.com>
- Removed apache-ant-1.6.2.patch.  Incorporated upstream.
  From David Walluck <david@jpackage.org>
- Add manifest-only package (mainly for eclipse)
- Add conflicts on j2sdk for Mandriva

changes.author: Deepak Bhole <dbhole@redhat.com> - 0:1.6.5-2jpp
changes.text:
- Added conditional native compilation
- Added patch to fix jvm version detection
- Add missing requirements
- Synch with Fedora spec

changes.author: Will Tatam <will.tatam@red61.com> - 0:1.7.0-0.Beta1.1jpp
changes.text:
- Upgraded to 1.7.0Beta1
- removed the apache-ant-1.6.5-jvm1.5-detect.patch as merged upstream

changes.author: Fernando Nasser <fnasser at redhat.com> - 0:1.7.0-1jpp
changes.text: - Upgrade to the final 1.7.0

changes.author: Ralph Apel <r.apel at r-apel.de> - 0:1.7.0-2.jpp5
changes.text:
- Add poms and depmap frags
- (B)R jpackage-utils >= 0:1.7.5
- BR java-devel = 0:1.5.0
- R java >= 0:1.5.0

changes.author: David Walluck <dwalluck@redhat.com> 0:1.7.1-1
changes.text:
- 1.7.1
- update maven pom files
- rediff apache-ant-jars.patch
- rediff apache-ant-bz163689.patch
- add apache-ant-gnu-classpath.patch
- set rpm_mode=true in conf since the ant script handles the rest

changes.author: David Walluck <dwalluck@redhat.com> 0:1.7.0-3
changes.text:
- add bootstrap mode
- replace some alternatives/virtual requires by explicit requires
- remove javadoc scriptlets
- fix GCJ support
- add workaround for xalan-j2 in %{_sysconfdir}/%{name}.d/trax
- version Obsoletes and add Provides
- remove Conflicts
- mark files in %{_sysconfdir} as %config(noreplace)

changes.author: David Walluck <dwalluck@redhat.com> 0:1.7.1-7
changes.text: - enable non-bootstrap

changes.author: David Walluck <dwalluck@redhat.com> 0:1.7.1-6
changes.text:
- add ant-bootstrap jar if bootstrap is enabled
- enable jmf, swing, trax if bootstrap is enabled
- BuildRequires: jaxp_transform_impl
- BuildRequires: junit for non-bootstrap

changes.author: David Walluck <dwalluck@redhat.com> 0:1.7.1-5
changes.text: - enable ant-nodeps in bootstrap mode

changes.author: David Walluck <dwalluck@redhat.com> 0:1.7.1-4
changes.text: - remove junit for bootstrap

changes.author: David Walluck <dwalluck@redhat.com> 0:1.7.1-3
changes.text: - build as bootstrap

changes.author: David Walluck <dwalluck@redhat.com> 0:1.7.1-2
changes.text: - set rpm_mode=false by default

changes.author: Permaine Cheung <pcheung@redhat.com> 0:1.7.1-7
changes.text:
- Update to 1.7.1
- Fix some rpmlint issues

changes.author: Permaine Cheung <pcheung@redhat.com> 0:1.7.1-7.1
changes.text: - Define with_gcj_support

changes.author: Tom "spot" Callaway <tcallawa@redhat.com> 0:1.7.1-7.2
changes.text:
- Exclude bogus perl(the) Requires
- Exclude bogus perl(oata), perl(examples) Provides

changes.author: Ignacio Vazquez-Abrams <ivazqueznet+rpm@gmail.com> - 0:1.7.1-8.2
changes.text: - Rebuild for Python 2.6

changes.author: Fedora Release Engineering <rel-eng@lists.fedoraproject.org> - 0:1.7.1-9.2
changes.text: - Rebuilt for https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_11_Mass_Rebuild

changes.author: Fedora Release Engineering <rel-eng@lists.fedoraproject.org> - 0:1.7.1-10.2
changes.text: - Rebuilt for https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_12_Mass_Rebuild

changes.author: Orion Poplawski <orion@cora.nwra.com> - 0:1.1.7-11
changes.text: - Add links to jar files into %{ant_home} (Bug #179759)

changes.author: Alexander Kurtakov <akurtako@redhat.com> 0:1.7.1-12
changes.text: - Fix compile with commons-net 2.0.

changes.author: Dennis Gregorovic <dgregor@redhat.com> - 0:1.7.1-12.1
changes.text: - Rebuilt for RHEL 6

changes.author: Jeff Johnston <jjohnstn@redhat.com> - 0:1.7.1-12.4
changes.text: - Fix license to include W3C

changes.author: Jeff Johnston <jjohnstn@redhat.com> - 0:1.7.1-12.3
changes.text: - Fix source URL

changes.author: Jeff Johnston <jjohnstn@redhat.com> - 0:1.7.1-12.2
changes.text: - Fix rpmlint warnings

changes.author: Jeff Johnston <jjohnstn@redhat.com> - 0:1.7.1-13
changes.text:
- Resolves: #585941
- Added apache-ant-package-info-bz43114.patch
